   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to noobJS (noobieJS)'s documentation!
=============================================

How to Install Library
----------------------

* Have Node.js 16.x and npm installed
* git clone this repo onto your local machine
* run <npm install>
* Have fun and contribute

How to Use Library
------------------

* Very straightforward and simple to pass an array of integers or strings to methods available

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
